CVR College of Engineering offers you the opportunity to gain expertise in the fields of Computer Science Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning through its trained and experienced faculty.

Presently, it is running B.Tech in 13 disciplines and M.Tech in 7 disciplines.

Institute of Technology, Nirma University (ITNU), Ahmedabad is a flagship institute of Nirma University established in the year 1995 and approved and accredited by NBA and NAAC ‘A+’ grade. Admission in the ITNU is done on the basis of JEE, GATE, UGC NET entrance exam.

College Name: Sant Longowal Institute of Engineering and Technology - [SLIET]

SLIET also conducts its own exam, ie. SET for admissions to certain courses. Applications are accepted online.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College (SREC) is one of the reputed educational colleges of Coimbatore which is managed by the SNR Sons Charitable Trust. It is an autonomous institute established in the year 1994. The college has been accredited by NAAC with an ‘A’ grade. It offers 10 Undergraduate and 8 Postgraduate programs in the field of Engineering, Technology, and Management. Admission to these courses is done on the basis of norms set by the state government. It also accepts a  valid score of Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Exam (TANCET).

Chennai Institute of Technology (CIT) is an independent institution situated in Kundrathur, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. CIT is an affiliate of Anna University and is recognized by AICTE and UGC. According to the NIRF 2023 ranking, the institute is ranked among the 151-200th engineering colleges.

Institute of Aeronautical Engineering (IARE), Hyderabad was established in the year 2000 and is run by Maruthi Educational Society. It is the first institute to start a B.Tech program in Aeronautical Engineering in the state of Telangana and has gradually transformed itself into an integrated multi-disciplinary technological institute. IARE is a prestigious engineering college offering eleven B.Tech programs, six M.Tech programs and MBA (Master of Business Administration) course under four specialization, with 20 years of rich standing in the educational sphere.

Nitte Meenakshi Institute of Technology (NMIT) is an autonomous engineering college in Bangalore, Karnataka. The college is approved by the AICTE, New Delhi and was started in the year 2001. Admission to NMIT depends on the performance of the candidates in various State/ National level entrance examinations.

Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram, established in 1985, is one of the topmost institutes in India. It offers 23 UG full-time courses and 11 PG full-time courses. The admission process is online, and admission is done as per TNEA score.

Rajalakshmi Engineering College [REC], Chennai accredited with ‘A’ Grade by NAAC is an academic Engineering college. PES University was established in 1972 as the PES Institute of Technology, later renamed in 2013. Sri Krishna College of Technology abbreviated as SKCT was established in the year of 1985. Looking at the placement record, more than 150 companies visit the college for placement and there are 800+ offers every year. The highest salary package stands at INR 28 LPA.

College Name: PSNA College of Engineering and Technology
Info Data: PSNA College of Engineering and Technology is a private college, located in Din Digul Tamil Nadu. It was established in 1984. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. BV Raju Institute of Technology (BVRIT), Hyderabad was established by the eminent philanthropist (Late) Padmabhushan Dr. B.V. Raju under the aegis of Sri Vishnu Educational Society (SVES) in the year 1997. Under the hegemony of the Chairman, Sri K.V.Vishnu Raju, BVRIT made a quantum leap in its reputation for its best teaching-learning practices, high-quality intake, excellent infrastructure facilities, the highest number of placements, etc. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Admission is done on the basis of entrance exam and criteria of the institute.

College Name: University of Petroleum and Energy Studies - [UPES]
Info Data: Every B-school has its unique strengths and so does UPES Dehradun which is famous for its domain-specific MBA. College Name: BMS Institute of Technology and Management - [BMSIT]
Info Data: BMS Institute of Technology and Management was established in 2002 and located in Bangalore. It is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi, and recognized by AICTE and NBA. BMSIT is a private institute that scored a high rank of 169 in NIRF. BMSIT offers UG, PG, MCA, MS, and Ph.D.

College Name: B. N. M. Institute of Technology - [BNMIT]
Info Data: BNM Institute of Technology (BNMIT), Bangalore is an autonomous college under VTU established in the year 2001. The institute offers undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral courses in the discipline of Engineering and Technology. Admission to BNMIT Bangalore is done on the basis of national and state entrance exams. Some of the top recruiters are Amazon, Google, Linkedin, Samsung, Flipkart, Bosch, Wipro, Toyota, HCL, Dell, Infosys, etc.

KLE Technology University was established in 1947 by the Karnatak Lingayat Education Society (KLE Society). KLE Technology University Course structure offers undergraduate programs, postgraduate courses, research, and PhD in various areas of study. Established in the year 1995, R.M.K. Engineering College is situated in a picturesque environment at Kavaraipettai, Gummidipoondi Taluk at a distance of 30 km from Chennai Tamil Nadu.The College is managed by Lakshmikanthammal Education Trust.

MIT World Peace University (MIT-WPU), popularly known as MIT-WPU Pune, is one of the leading private engineering and management institutions in India, located in Kothrud, Pune. MIT-WPU Pune is a part of the MIT Group of Institutions and has been recognized by UGC. MIT-WPU Pune is a premier institution of higher learning offering 150+ Programs at different levels across various streams including Management, Engineering, Design, Health Sciences, Liberal Arts, Law, and many others.

Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology (VIIT) Pune is a private institute established in 2002. It is affiliated with SPPU and accredited with an “A” grade by NAAC. VIIT Pune is managed by the Bansilal Ramnath Agarwal Charitable Trust. VIIT Pune is also ranked 51st by NIRF Innovation 2023 in the overall category.

Anurag University Hyderabad runs under the Gayathri Educational and Cultural Trust (GECT). The trust was founded in the year 1998 by ‘Guru’ Sri Sivananda Murthy Garu to impart quality education. The Anurag Group of Institutions (AGI) is one of the first few integrated campuses of South India established in 2002, offering programs in Engineering & Technology, Pharmacy, and Business Management. In the year 2020, AGI was officially named as Anurag University. The Institute is affiliated with JNTU, Hyderabad and approved by UGC. Anurag University is accredited with an ‘A’ Grade by NAAC (National Assessment and Accreditation Council).

Narula Institute of Technology, commonly known as NIT Agarpara & NIT Kolkata, is a private autonomous institution established in 2001 in Kolkata, West Bengal under the JIS Group Educational Initiative. The institute has consistently been ranked among the top engineering colleges, securing 151st position in the NIRF Innovation 2023 rankings under the “Overall” category.

PESCE Mandya was established in the year 1962. The college is affiliated with the Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) and is recognized by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). PESCE has secured 151st rank in the engineering category by NIRF 2023.

College Name: Manav Rachna International Institute Of Research And Studies, Faculty of Engineering and Technology - [MRIIRSFET]

Vasavi College of Engineering popularly known as VCE Hyderabad is an autonomous self-financed institute established in 1981. Chikka Muniyappa Reddy Institution of Technology (CMRIT), Bangalore, popularly known as CMR Institute of Technology under CMR Jnanadhara Trust, has recently placed 1,767 students in well-reputed companies with a highest salary package of INR 11.76 LPA and average salary package of INR 4.87 LPA.

The admissions at the college are sought through counseling based on the rank secured in the EAMCET entrance exam at UG level while based on the rank secured in GATE, and PGECET at PG level.

Haldia Institute of Technology (HIT) is a private institute of the Indian Centre for Advancement of Research and Education (ICARE), established in 1996 in Haldia, West Bengal. The institute offers courses in different fields like Engineering, Technology, Applied Science and Humanities, and Management and Social Science.

Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology (RAIT), Navi Mumbai was established in 1983, to promote academic excellence in professional Engineering education, and is part of well known D.Y. Patil Group. It is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), a statutory body of the government of India.

College Name: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology - [SVCET]

Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the entrance examination. The National Institute of Engineering (NIE) is one of the oldest institutes in Karnataka founded in 1964. Further, it has also got autonomous status from Visvesvaraya Technological University. The institute has been ranked in the bandwidth of 151-200 by NIRF Ranking 2023 for B.Tech. NIE Mysore B.Tech Ranking by India Today is 43rd.

NERIST Nirjuli is ranked 151-200 by NIRF 2023 under the “Engineering” category.

Velagapudi Ramakrishna Siddhartha Engineering College was established in 1977. It offers B.Tech in the UG course. Eligibility for this course is 10 + 2 passed from a recognized university. Eligibility for these courses is a bachelor's degree in a relevant field. Selection in M.Tech and MBA, MCA is done on the basis of PGECET and AP ICET entrance exams respectively.

Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering, popularly known as PCCOE, established in 1999, comes under the umbrella of Pimpri Chinchwad Education Trust (PCET). College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering - [DJSCE]

College Name: Fr. Conceicao Rodrigues College of Engineering - [CRCE]

College Name: Dr. B R Ambedkar Institute of Technology
Info Data: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology is a private Institute which was established in 1984. The Institute is accredited with B+ grade by NAAC with a score of 2.6 on a 4 point scale and has also been affiliated to Indian Maritime University, Chennai.

College Name: The LNM Institute of Information Technology - [LNMIIT]

College Name: SRM Institute of Science and Technology - [SRMIST]

Info Data: Christ University Bangalore is a private university of repute in India, initially established as Christ College in 1969. Nirma University Ahmedabad is a research-oriented and state private university. The university is recognised by UGC and accredited by NAAC with an “A+” Grade. It is a member of AIU and ACU. It has received a Centre of Excellence (CoE) status from the Government of Gujarat.

IMS Engineering College popularly known as IMSEC Ghaziabad is a premier institution in North India among the engineering colleges. The institute is approved by AICTE and also accredited with ‘A’ grade by NAAC.

Info Data: Geethanjali College of Engineering and Technology (GCET) is a private technical institution located in Hyderabad, Telangana. The institution has been granted autonomous status under UGC 2(f) and 12(b) and is affiliated to JNTU, Hyderabad. Further, GCET is accredited by NAAC with grade A+. Geethanjali College of Engineering and Technology ranked in the band 101-105 by NIRF Innovation for the year 2023. It also ranked in the band of excellent by Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) of Ministry of Education (MoE).

IILM Academy of Higher Learning (Greater Noida) was established in the year 2001 under the aegis of the Ram Krishan & Sons Charitable Trust. It is located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. The academy is affiliated to Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University - (AKTU, Lucknow). It has been approved by AICTE and is accredited by NAAC. It is a private institute.

Indraprastha Engineering College (IPEC) is one of the most prestigious private engineering colleges established in 2000 in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh under the Shail Garg Shiksha Sansthan. IPEC Ghaziabad is NAAC and NBA accredited. Inderprastha Engineering College is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow and approved by AICTE. IPEC offers B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, Data Science, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering and in Computer Science Engineering. Admission to B.Tech and M.Tech at depends upon merit in followed by UPTAC counselling and respectively. The campus of is spread over an area of The institute is ranked among the “colleges of Dr. APJ AKTU.

Kanpur Institute of Technology is a private university located in Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh. It has a green and clean campus, spread over 25 acres. It is surrounded by the all important hubs of Kanpur and can be easily reached from any region. A team from the Indus Technical Education Society (ITES) established the institute in 2004. Kanpur Institute of Technology and Pharmacy and Kanpur Institute of Higher Education were later integrated with the institute.

Kashi Institute of Technology (KIT) was established in Varanasi in the year 2008. The college is approved by AICTE and affiliated with Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU). Education Excellence Awards, and National Education Excellence Awards are some of the awards given to KIT for its academic excellence. The institute offers various courses in engineering, management, and polytecnic courses. Computer Science & Engineering, CSE (AI & ML), Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Biotechnology are some specializations offered in the B. Tech course at Kashi Institute of Technology. Admission to the courses is made based on the merit score from the entrance exams such as JEE-Main, CAT, MAT, and KMET.

Lakshmi Narain College of Technology (LNCT), Jabalpur is a private college established in 2008 under the aegis of H. K. Kalchuri Education Society. The college is affiliated to RGPV, RDVV and approved by AICTE. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering & Management.

Meenakshi Sundararajan Engineering College (MSEC) is located in Kodambakkam at Chennai. It is one of the most prestigious colleges in Tamil Nadu for engineering. The college is a part of KRS group of institutions. Since inception, it has been an institution with a Centre of Excellence. The institution has established industrial collaborations with the following industries:

The Nandha engineering college was established in 2001 in the Erode district of Tamil Nadu. It is an autonomous institution accredited by NAAC and NBA. It was founded by Nandha institutions. The Institute is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). It offers B.E/B. Tech, M.E/M.Tech, MBA, MCA courses. Admission procedures for the courses are strictly based on TNEA and TANCET exams. Candidates can apply for admission to the college by filling the online application form.

Pragati Engineering College, Surampalem was established in 2001 by the Gayatri Educational Society. The Institute is placed in an area of 25 acres of land giving wide academic and infrastructural facilities. It is affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada, accredited by NAAC and NBA, and approved by AICTE. It offers admissions at UG and PG levels with over 4857 students. Admissions are entrance based. The institute also offers good placement opportunities and the highest package reported was INR 29 LPA.

Prathyusha Engineering College (PEC) Thiruvallur is a reputed engineering college and the recipient of 5th Rank in 2017-18 University Results among 497 Engineering Colleges in Tamil Nadu. The mission of the college is to emerge as a premier Institution in the country by developing centers of excellence in frontier areas of Engineering, Technology and Management”. PEC, Thiruvallur is a self-financed Telugu Minority Institution approved by AICTE, New Delhi, affiliated to Anna University, Chennai accredited by NBA and a recipient of ISO certification. The institute has received NAAC Accreditation with A Grade for its state of the art infrastructure and best in class academic programs.

The RCC Institute of Information Technology [RCCIIT], established in 1999, is an institute of technology located in Kolkata, West Bengal. The Institute affiliated to the Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology in West Bengal is the result of a collaborative venture between the Ministry of IT, Govt of India, and the Department of Higher Education, Govt of West Bengal. RCCIIT has received NBA accreditation for EE, CSE, IT and ECE departments and is accredited Grade’B++” by NAAC. RCCIIT Kolkata is approved by the AICTE and NBA and has partnered with many reputed Foreign as well as Indian Universities like North Dakota State University (USA), University of Regina (Canada), College of Medicine Swansea University (UK), University of Illinois, Chicago (USA), University of Buffalo (USA), Texas Tech University, different IITs (Kharagpur, Kanpur, Roorkee, Guwahati), IIM (Kozhikode), IIEST, ISM, Jadavpur University, etc.

RMD College is a Co-Educational engineering college in Tamil Nadu, India, funded by the Sri Swaminatha Naidu Educational Trust. It was established in 2000 and is considered one of the best state engineering colleges located in Thiruvallur. According to the NIRF rankings 2023, RMD College was placed 8th in Tamil Nadu and 258th out of 394 colleges in India. It is an AICTE-approved institution. RMD College offers Degree courses in full-time mode, comprising 7 UG and 1 PG course.

Sambhram Institute of Technology is located in East Bangalore which was established in the year 2001. It is approved by AICTE and accredited by the NBA. The institute is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University. The campus is spread over 10 acres. The institute provides 1 UG course and 3 PG courses in Engineering, Business Management and is ranked among the top Engineering Institutions in Bangalore. Current students that are taken annually for UG and PG programs are around 1200 in number. Entrance exams like GATE, PGCET are accepted at the institute.

Sphoorthy Engineering College, established in 2004 is affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Hyderabad and is approved by AICTE and UGC. It is accredited with “A Grade” by NAAC. The college offers undergraduate courses in Technology across various specializations. Candidates seeking admission to UG courses have to appear for AP EAMCET. The college is well known for its innovative spirit, intensive research and hands-on approach to solving real-world problems, producing skillful engineers who are well-received by industry and academia.

Sri Eshwar College of Engineering, Coimbatore, established in 2008, is one of the finest engineering colleges out there in Coimbatore. The institute offers BE/B. Tech and ME/ M.Tech courses over various disciplines. Some of the salient features of the college are industry powered laboratories, start-up accelerators, and the college's own IT Center. The college provides a lot of support to the students in the form of Value Added Courses. They also have a center for International Relations, Higher Education, Entrepreneurship Development, Industry Institution Interaction, Social welfare, and IEEE Chapter.

The Oxford College of Engineering, Bengaluru was established in 1974 and is an engineering institute that provides several courses at the U.G., P.G., and Doctorate level to eligible candidates. The college comes under the  Visvesvaraya Technological University. The College of Engineering has received "A" grade accreditation from the NBA and NAAC, approval from AICTE and recognition as a research center from VTU. Furthermore, the Government of Karnataka recognizes the college as an educational body of significance situated in the state. Admission to all the programs offered is made purely based on merit and depends on the candidate's score in various entrance examinations.

The first kind of Bhilai Institute of Technology came into presence on the July month of 1986. Bhilai Institute of Technology, Raipur (BITR) was founded in the year 2009 as the successor institution by the BIT Trust (Seth BalKrishan Memorial), which already regulates the institution at Durg. It offers Diploma, UG and PG level courses in the Engineering discipline. It is one of the great sorts after engineering college organized in Kendri on the rapidly expanding heart of the Raipur city. It has bagged few rankings.

Jaipur Engineering College (JEC Jaipur) is one of the leading facilities accredited by AICTE. The institute offers a total of 12 UG and PG courses in multiple specializations out of which B.Tech and M.Tech courses are popular. This university is the state's first nodal center of NITTTR, Chandigarh. Additionally, it is the primary remote center of IIT Bombay & IIT Kharagpur. Admission to the college is both merit and entrance-based. The admission process for B.Tech programs is based on JEE Main/REAP whereas the admission process for the M.Tech program is merit-based. Applicants may apply through the official website or they may also visit the campus in person to fill the application form. The institute also provides a variety of scholarships – merit-based, need-based, student-specific, career-specific and college-specific to encourage students as well as aid them for the purpose of learning.

Vidyavardhaka College of Engineering (VVCE) is one of Karnataka's premier engineering colleges, founded in 1997 by the Vidyavardhaka Sangha in Mysuru, and has over 100 recruitment partners. The Karnataka government has recognized VVCE, an independent institution connected to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belagavi, and accredited by AICTE and UGC, New Delhi. VVCE is accredited by NBA (CSE, ISE, ME, EEE, ECE, CV) and NAAC with an "A" rating. Vidyavardhaka College of Engineering (VVCE), Mysuru, sprawling on 23 acres of land, provides INR 20 Lac Per Annum scholarships to needy & deserving students every year.

Vidya Jyothi Institute of Technology was established in 1998 by Vidya Jyothi Educational Society. It is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad and approved by AICTE. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology in various specializations. VJIT also offers a postgraduate course in management.

The Gandhi Institute of Technology and Management, commonly known as GITAM, Visakhapatnam is one of the best private engineering Deemed to be University established in 1980. It was previously known as GITAM College. GITAM has been approved by UGC. It has been granted the status of deemed to be university in 2007. GITAM aims to impart futuristic and comprehensive education of global standards and is responsible for imparting education in the field of Engineering and Technology.

Modern Vidya Niketan (MVN) University is a private institution established in 2012 by the State Legislature. It is located in Delhi - Agra National Highway, Delhi NCR, Haryana. Modern Vidya Niketan Society acts as the managing body of the institution providing best facilities like adequate classrooms, well equipped laboratories, modern gym facilities, hostel, hygienic and clean cafeteria, and a Library. It offers various courses under UG, PG, and doctoral levels. This institution believes in creating leaders in higher education. Also, regular industrial visits and collaboration with top companies increases the chances of employment for the students.

Arni University is a private university located in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh. Established in 2009, Arni University is approved and recognized by various reputed institutions like HP-PERC, PCI, ISO, etc. Also, the institute offers scholarship of up to 100% The university has 10 schools of study under it and offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in the streams of Technology, Management, Commerce, Medicine, Arts, and Science. Admission to these courses is both merit and entrance-based i.e. AUCET. Students from Arni University are placed in well-reputed and prestigious companies like Allianz, Hero Cycles, Honda, ICICI Bank, ITC Ltd., Cease Fire, etc.

Bahra University, approved by University Grants Commission (UGC) is located in the Shimla Hills, Solan, and was established in the year 2011. The University is one of the leading members of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). Bahra University has been ranked as the Number 1 University in Himachal Pradesh and has grabbed the 13th position in India by Silicon Valley 2014.

Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Bangalore is ranked 8th Best University in India by NIRF, Govt of India and awarded ‘Institution of Eminence’ tag to Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham University to emerge as World-Class Teaching and Research Institution by Government of India. Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham University offers degree courses in the discipline of Engineering, Communication, Data Science, etc. Admissions are done on the basis of merit and the cutoff criteria of the institute.

Sangam University was established in 2012 by the Badral Soni Charitable Trust in Bhilwara, Rajasthan. It is among the top ten private engineering Colleges in Rajasthan and has been approved by multiple governmental associations. The university offers a total of 12 undergraduate, 5 post graduate, and 3 diploma, in addition to some doctoral and post-doctoral courses. Graduates from the university are placed in companies such as HDFC Bank, Indusind Bank, Wipro, Cognizant and Accenture, etc. All the admissions at the college entrance-based. Applicants have only an offline option to apply for the admission at different schools of Sangam University.

College Name: Periyar Maniammai Institute of Science and Technology - [PMIST]
Info Data: Periyar Maniammai Institute of Science & Technology (PMIST), Thanjavur is a deemed to be university established in 2007. The institute is spread over 216 acres of land and is an energy-efficient, pollution-free, zero-waste, and well-laid campus. PMIST courses include undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Architecture, Computer Science & Engineering, Science, Education, etc. PMIST admissions are based on national-level entrance exams like JEE-Main, NATA, GATE, CAT, etc.

Shri Venkateshwara University (SVU) is spread over a 70-acre area in the Amroha district of Uttar Pradesh. SVU was established in the year 2010 by the Sri Bankey Bihari Educational & Welfare Trust in 2010 through UP Govt Act 26 of 2010. The University offers a wide array of courses at the undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral level. The curriculum designed by the university is exhaustive as it offers courses in multiple disciplines and allows the students to gain deep insight into the study-related concepts.

St. Joseph College of Engineering, established in 1994, is a private institute located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The college is affiliated to Anna University, approved by AICTE and accredited by NBA and NAAC. St. Joseph College of Engineering provided UG and PG courses across engineering and management streams. At UG level, the institute provides BE/B.Tech and at PG level, it provides ME/M.Tech and MBA. Admissions to all courses are entrance based.

Established in 1993, Lakshmi Narain College of Technology (LNCT), Bhopal is premier institute in MP. The college offers 13 undergraduate and 9 postgraduate programs, all offered in a full-time mode in the field of Engineering, Business and Management Studies, IT, and software.

GMR Institute of Technology is an engineering college located in Andhra Pradesh, India. It is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada. GMRIT provides its learning community state-of-the-art facilities, infrastructure and a competent faculty. The Institute encourages collaborative learning between industry and academia as a means of reinforcing its curriculum with practical and real-world experiences.

Intended for the propagation of reflective knowledge among the ambitious student community in Engineering and Technology the college was established in the year of 2008.This is a Christian minority college that is working under Jaisakthi Educational Trust. Located at Poonamallee, a city close to Chennai,the college is spread across 65.745 acres of land.

Muthayammal Engineering College (MCE), Namakkal was established in 2000 and is running under the aegis of Muthayammal Educational Trust and Research Foundation. The college is affiliated to Anna University. It is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (A.I.C.T.E) and accredited by National Board of Accreditation (NBA). The college offers undergraduate, postgraduate and Ph.D. Courses. The main objective of the college is to prepare students with high professional skills and ethical value. The college has a placement cell that conducts many programs like programs for confidence building through external experts, regular aptitude test, group discussions, and career counseling to prepare the students for their final placement.

Technocrats Institute of Technology (Excellence), Bhopal was established in 1999 by TIT Group of Institutions under the guidance of “Chandra Vadani Mahila Shiksha Samiti”. The college is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Technical University. It is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (A.I.C.T.E) and the Government of Madhya Pradesh. It is one of the premier technical institutes that provides the best quality education in the field of Engineering and Technology. The college offers courses in Management and engineering fields. The college has separate accommodation for girls and boys with furnished rooms and uninterrupted power supply. There is a special vehicle available 24/7 at the hostel premises.

College Name: Vel Tech Rangarajan Dr. Sagunthala R and D Institute of Science and Technology - [Vel Tech]
Info Data: Vel Tech Rangarajan Dr. Sagunthala R and D Institute of Science and Technology apporved by UGC & MHRD is a Deemed University, located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is also accredited by NAAC with the highest grade A++ and ranked 87th in Engineering Category by NIRF 2023. The University provides multiple courses under the Under Graduate, Post Graduate as well as Doctoral domains in Engineering, Management, Media, Technology, and Law. Admission to Vel Tech University can be done by applying online or by visiting the Vel Tech Admission Office. The selection methods of various courses offered by the university are different. In the year 2021, Vel Tech University Placement has seen excellent growth in its highest package offered at INR 22 LPA. Top corporates such as Capgemini, Accenture, IBM, Infosys, TCS, Wipro, HCL, Mindtree, DXC, TechMahindra, Amazon, Walmart, Informatica, etc., hire productive professionals from Vel Tech.

Axis Colleges was established in the year 2010 in Kanpur. The college is a private institution approved by AICTE, Council of Architecture, PCI, UGC, National Cyber Defense Research Centre, and MHRD. It is affiliated with Dr. A.P.J Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU).

Amity University Greater Noida is a private university established by the State Government. It is recognized by UGC and holds the membership of AIU and the Association of Commonwealth Universities. Amity University Greater Noida is approved by AICTE and accredited by NAAC with an “A+” Grade. The university offers UG, PG and Doctoral programs in the fields of Commerce, Computer Science, Engineering, Literature, Management, Finance, Mass Communication, Travel and Tourism, Social Science, etc. Apart from this, it also offers value addition courses for overall personal and professional development.

Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology is the private engineering college established with the approval of AICTE. It is affiliated to Aryabhata Knowledge University, Patna. The institute offers courses in the field of engineering. Admissions are done on the basis of national entrance exams i.e JEE Main and BPTPIA scores. The institute has training and placement cell to enhance the skills of the student to be placed in good companies. Almost 80% of students have been placed in good companies.

Excel Engineering College was established in 2007 by Sri Rangaswamy Educational Trust. It has been graded ‘A+’ by NAAC. The college is affiliated with Anna University and approved by AICTE. Apart from B.E./ B.Tech, the institute also offers M.E. in 6 different disciplines and various Ph.D. programs. The admission process is merit-based, a valid score in the TNEA examination is the minimum requirement to take part in the counseling process. Last year, the cutoff rank for Biomedical Engineering went up to 6240.

Muthayammal College of Engineering is a private engineering college located in Rasipuram, Tamil Nadu. It is ranked among one of the best engineering colleges in India. It is accredited by NBA & NAAC. It offers UG, PG & Ph.D in its campus. It has 16 departments in total. The total intake capacity of the college is 1110. Admission to the institute is both on the basis of merit & entrance. For UG programs, admission is done on the basis of TNEA counselling and for PG programs, TANCET scores are accepted. The college has 22% of faculty members with Ph.D. and more than 50% of faculty have experience of more than 10 years.

Sandip University is a self financed private university located in Nashik, Maharashtra. Established in 2017, the University is UGG recognised, offering both Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in the fields of Engineering and Technology, Law, Commerce and Management, Health Sciences, Pharmaceutical Sciences, Fashion Design and Beauty, Interior Design for the students. The University also offers some Part time programs and Vocational courses.

IIMT University (IIMTU) is a private university established in 2016 in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh. It is recognized by UGC. The university offers education through 16+ schools and colleges. IIMT University Meerut has been positioned in the band 51- 100 in the Innovation Category by NIRF, 2023. The University was also ranked in the Diamond Band with Grade A in OBE Rankings 2023 and recognised in the band “Excellent” by ARIIA 2021. IIMT Meerut UP achieved a 4-star rating from the Ministry of Education’s Innovation Cell.

Bengal College of Engineering formerly known as BCETW is a private engineering institute located in Bidhan Nagar, Durgapur, West Bengal, India. It was established in the year 2009 by the SKS Educational and Social Trust. The institute is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and affiliated to Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology, Kolkata. It offers engineering study in various fields. Bengal College of Engineering accepts JEE Main and WBJEE.

Apex University (AU), Jaipur was established by the Rajasthan State Legislature Act No. 27 of 2018. It is a private university established in the year 1965. It is recognized by the UGC and is approved by the AICTE. Apex University was ranked 1st in the emerging university of Rajasthan by Forbes India. The University is also approved by the Bar Council of India (BCI), Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) and National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE). Recently, Apex University has been the most preferred university with more than 3.5 lakh registrations as per CUET 2023.

JSS Science and Technology University [JSS STU] is a well-renowned private institute and has been approved by AICTE and UGC. With a sprawling 102 acres campus filled with state-of-the-art facilities. It provides various undergraduate, postgraduate, and Ph.D. programs with multiple specializations under every course.  Admission procedure takes place online after the results for the various entrance exams have been announced. Apart from studies the institute also focuses on the extra-curricular growth of its students and has various student clubs, fests, and sports facilities available for them.

Eternal University, Baru Sahib was established under the Himachal Pradesh Private Universities Act with effect from April 29, 2008. It is a Self-Financed Private University recognized by the UGC under the UGC act of 1956. It is located at a sprawling 8, 00,000 sq. ft campus at Baru Sahib. It is NAAC accredited & ISO 9001: 2015 Certified University established under the Himachal Pradesh Private University (Establishment & Regulation) Act 2006 & Himachal Pradesh Government Act.no. 3 of 2009

Established in the year 2018, Sardar Patel University is a state private university situated in Madhya Pradesh. Situated in a serene and lush green environment, the university stretches over a massive 80 acres of land in Dongariya village near the city of Balaghat.

College Name: Aalim Muhammed Salegh College of Engineering - [AALIMEC]
Info Data: Aalim Muhammed Salegh College of Engineering (AALIMEC) is a private engineering college established in 1990 at Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai, and is approved by AICTE. It helps in imparting career-oriented courses to all its students to acquire knowledge and skills and converts them into true professionals as per International and National Standards. AALIMEC Chennai offers B.E. across six specializations.

College Name: Accurate Institute of Management and Technology - [AIMT]
Info Data: Accurate Institute of Management and Technology is present in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. It is affiliated with Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow, and approved by AICTE. The institute Ranked A+++ Best B-School by Business India Survey 2024 and Awarded Excellence in Management Education in North India by Jagran Josh, 2023. Accurate Institute of Management and Technology offers several UG, PG, and diplomas in engineering, business administration, and computer application.

Asians Institute of Technology is a private Institute established in 2009 by Gayatri Devi Shiksha Sansthan in partnership with the Government of Rajasthan. The Institute has been affiliated with Rajasthan Technical University, Kota and approved by AICTE. AIT is known for its flagship B.Tech and admissions are offered through Rajasthan Engineering Admission Process (REAP) based on JEE Mains score.

College Name: Bhoj Reddy Engineering College for Women
Info Data: Bhoj Reddy Engineering College for Women is situated in Hyderabad, and was established in 1997. It provides an apt environment for the growth of girls who want to study engineering. It was established with the primary motive of empowering women through right education, and is run by a voluntary social action group, Sangam Laxmibai Vidyapeeth. It offers B.Tech. courses in 4 specializations like Computer Science and technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Information Technology, and Electrical and Electronics Engineering. It is affiliated to , and is approved by AICTE.

Budge Budge Institute of Technology (BBIT) was founded in 2009 at Kolkata, West Bengal. It is affiliated to the Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology for UG & PG programs and WBSCTE for Diploma programs. The institute offers Engineering & Technology (CE, ME, ECE, EE & CSE), Polytechnic (Diploma) and Management programs in Marketing, Finance and Human Resource. All the courses are approved by AICTE. The institute has a top-class infrastructure and excellent placement records.

Calcutta Institute of Technology, Kolkata was established in 2004, is one of the leading Institutes in the field of engineering. It is a private Institute with affiliation to Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology (MAKAUT), and is approved by AICTE, New Delhi. The Institute offers B.Tech at the UG level, M.Tech, and M.C.A. at the PG level and Diploma in various disciplines of Engineering. Admission to B.Tech is on the basis of valid scores in JEE Mains. Candidates who have applied for MCA are admitted by WBJECA conducted by the state and they shall be considered eligible only if they possess a graduation degree in the related field whereas admission to M.Tech is on the basis of PGET counselling conducted by WBUT.

Camellia Institute of Technology (CIT) is a private engineering college situated in the heart of Kolkata. CIT offers B.Tech in 6 specializations, B.Tech Lateral Entry and Diploma courses. Admissions to the B.Tech courses are based on the WBJEE rank held. Admissions for the B.Tech Lateral Entry courses are based on rank held in JELET. The selection of eligible candidates in the Diploma course is based on merit in the last qualifying exam. Applications are accepted online.

City Engineering College is an institution located in central Bangalore that provides vivid courses in engineering for graduation as well as post-graduation. The college is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological Institute (VTU), Karnataka, and has crossed 19 years of establishment.

Dream Institute of Technology was established in 2006 and is one of the best private engineering colleges in South Kolkata. The institute offers UG and PG courses across Science, Engineering, Humanities, and Management streams. It offers B.Tech, BBA, BHM, BCA, and B. Sc. at UG level and M.Tech at the PG level. Applications for these courses are processed online. Admission to the college is done on the basis of the entrance exam.

Jaya Engineering College, Chennai was established in 1995. It is a part of the huge Jaya group of colleges. It provides 9 UG courses as well as 7 PG courses. All the courses are approved by AICTE, New Delhi. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai.

KLN College of Engineering was established in 1994 is one of the best engineering colleges in Madurai providing high-quality education. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, doctorate, and certificate skill courses. For under graduation, this college offers 7 specializations, for post-graduation, 7 streams from different courses are offered. This college also offers Ph.D. in 4 streams. MBA, MCA, B.Tech, are some of the most popular courses offered by this college. The admission is both merit and entrance based. The application process is conducted online and offline.

College Name: Kamaraj College of Engineering and Technology - [KCET]
Info Data: Kamaraj College of Engineering and Technology (KCET) is situated in Virudhunagar in Tamil Nadu. KCET was founded in the year of 1998. The college offers both UG and PG engineering courses. The college campus extends to an area of about 47.92 acres. KCET is affiliated to Anna University Chennai and got its approval from the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). KCET recently attained the state of autonomous from 2019 to 2029.

MCKV Institute of Engineering (MCKVIE) is a private engineering college founded in the year 1999. It is affiliated with the Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology and approved by AICTE. MCKVIE is a UGC recognized Autonomous Institute under the UGC Act 1956 and accredited by NAAC with Grade ‘A’. The college offers UG and PG degree courses in the disciplines of Engineering and Management. The flagship courses of MCKVIE include B.Tech across 9 disciplines and M.Tech in Electronics & Communication. Other courses of the institute include B.Voc across 3 specializations and an MBA program accorss 4 specializations. Admission to the B.Tech courses depends on the candidate’s performance in WBJEE or JEE Mains whereas valid GATE or PGET scores are required for M.Tech admission. Candidates who have a Diploma in Engineering or B.Sc can opt for Lateral entry in the B.Tech course by appearing in JELET and obtaining a valid score. Accepted entrance tests for MBA enrollment are CAT/GMAT/MAT/JEMAT/XAT.

Mahakal Institute of Technology (MIT) is a private engineering institute established in the year 2001 at Ujjain, Madhya. It is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya and has been approved by AICTE. The institute offers B.Tech, ME, M.Tech, Diploma in engineering programs under highly qualified and technically experienced faculty members. More than 100 reputed organizations participate in the campus drive every year.

Mangalam College of Engineering (MLM) was established in 2002, is located in Ettumanoor, Kerala. MLM is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and affiliated to theAPJ Abdul Kalam Technological University in Kerala. MLM is promoted by the Mangalam Educational Society. MLM has received National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with A grade and NBA accreditation for CSE, CE, ME and ECE course.

Moradabad Institute of Technology popularly known as MIT Moradabad is a private college established in the year 1996 in Moradabad, Uttar Pradesh. The institute is approved by AICTE, COA, PCI, Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE) and the Government of Uttar Pradesh. It is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU), Lucknow. The college is recognized by the NBA and accredited by NAAC with Grade A. MIT Moradabad offers various degree courses such as B.Tech, B.Voc and MBA programs. Admission at MIT Moradabad is based on the scores of the entrance exams such as , CAT, MAT, etc. followed by UPTAC counselling.

College Name: Muffakham Jah College of Engineering & Technology - [MJCET]
Info Data: Muffakham Jah College of Engineering and Technology (MJCET), Hyderabad was established in 1980 under Sultan-ul-Uloom Education Society (SUES). It is affiliated to Osmania University, Hyderabad and approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. The vision of the college is to be a part of the universal human quest for development and progress by contributing high caliber, ethical, and socially responsible engineers who meet the global challenge of building a modern society in harmony with nature. MJCET is among the Top 5 Engineering colleges in Hyderabad and also tops the list among Minority Engineering Colleges in the State of Telangana. The college is spread over campus with a built-up area of 38,251 sq. mtrs. and located at Banjara Hills which is the most prime location in the city of Hyderabad. The college takes admission in fields in the qualifying scorecard of entrance exams like / TSEAMCET.

Nalla Malla Reddy Engineering College (NMREC) is a self-financed private Autonomous Engineering college established in the year 2001 located in Hyderabad. The institute has always been working towards quality education. NMREC is a ‘Complete Institution’, molding the students into the best, versatile, honest engineers and scientists with ‘Complete Education’, imparting quality education. The college is offering B.Tech programs in - CSE, CSE (AI&ML), ECE, EEE, Mechanical and Civil Engineering. M.Tech programs are being offered in Computer Networks and Information Security, CAD/CAM, VLSI Systems Design, and in Electrical Power Engineering. NMREC also offers an MBA program.

Narasaraopeta Engineering College (NEC), established in 1998, is located in Narasaraopeta. It is sponsored by Gayatri Educational Development Society. The college is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada and accredited by NBA as a Tier-1 college. It is an autonomous institute which is accredited by NAAC with an ‘A+’ Grade.

College Name: Oriental Institute of Science and Technology - [OIST]
Info Data: Oriental Institute of Science & Technology (OIST), Jabalpur was founded in the year 2008. It is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya and has been approved by NBA and AICTE. Presently, it is running B. Tech and diploma courses in various specializations and also an MBA program. The institute has the top-class infrastructure and is famous for its outstanding campus placement record.

Sri Sai Ranganathan Engineering College (REC) in Coimbatore is an affiliation of Anna University in Chennai offering BE and B.Tech for Undergraduate applicants and M.E and MBA for Postgraduate applicants. The popular courses of the college are MBA and B.Tech whereby students are offered 5 specializations in MBA.

SKR Engineering College (SKREC), Chennai was established in 2001. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. The vision of the college is to transform the budding engineers into academically excellent, highly intellectual and self-disciplined Engineering graduates and also to mold them into good citizens with the spirit of integrity and catering to the needs of the nation. The mission of the college is to impart quality education with high standards of excellence in engineering and technology by providing B.Tech, M.E, and MBA courses to the students. Admission to such courses is done on the basis of entrance tests conducted at the state and national levels.

College Name: Sagar Institute of Science and Technology - [SISTec] - Sagar Group of Institutions
Info Data: Sagar Institute of Science and Technology (SISTEC), Bhopal one of the best engineering colleges in MP, established in 2007. SISTec since its inception has featured in the list of top-ranked engineering colleges in India. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Engineering and Management. Accepted entrance scores are CAT/ MAT/ CMAT for MBA, JEE Mains for B.Tech, and GATE for M.Tech.
Departments

Established in the year 2002, Sri Ramakrishna Institute of Technology (SRIT) is located in Pachapalayam, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. The institute offers six undergraduate programs and five postgraduate programs in the Engineering and Technology domain which includes the MBA.

College Name: Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology - [SIET]
Info Data: Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology is in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. It offers engineering courses at UG and PG levels in civil, mechanical, and computer science engineering. It also enrolls students in interdisciplinary courses like agricultural engineering, biomedical engineering, and biotechnology. Besides this, it also offers specialization in machine learning and data science, which are current demands of industries.

Thejus Engineering College, a project of Cheruvathur Foundation, was established in the year 2009. The college is located at Vellarakkad, on the side of Kunnamkulam-Wadakkanchery Highway in Thrissur District. The college offers B.Tech and M.Tech courses to the aspirants. Admission to B.Tech program is given as per the merit in the qualifying examination or through KEAM conducted by CEE, Kerala. Whereas admission to the M.Tech course is given on the basis of the rank list produced by DTE, Kerala, and merit of the qualifying examination. The mode for applying to these courses is offline. Candidates can get the application form from the college’s office or can download it from the college’s website.

Prestige Institute of Management & Research (PIMR) was established in the year 2008 with the mission to provide exceptional professional education and training to students. Prestige Group has expertise in running colleges in Indore, Gwalior, Dewas and now in Bhopal. The Prestige Institute of Management & Research, Bhopal is approved by AICTE. The Institute is affiliated with Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya for technical courses and with Barkatullah University for non-technical courses. The institute offers B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, B.Ed., B.Sc., BBA, B.Com, B.Pharma and D.harma courses. The institution provides company based professional training for its students.

College Name: JSPM Narhe Technical Campus - [JSPM NTC] Narhe
Info Data: JSPM Narhe Technical Campus was established in 2011. It is 7th college of JSPM Institute. It is to create a stimulating learning environment, an environment in which you can prepare for tomorrow and all that the future can bring. It offers MBA, MCA and Engineering courses. It aims to nurture and maintain an environment of high academic excellence, research and entrepreneurship for all aspiring students. It is located at Pune, Maharashtra.

VSB Engineering College, Karur was ranked 29th in the Top 100 Engineering Colleges in India by Silicon India Magazine. In the 2019 placements, the college has placed a total of 514 students receiving 1144 offers from 47 recruiting companies like Capgemini, Wipro, TCS, IBM, etc. Out of 514 students selected for the job, 315 students got a salary package of INR 3+ LPA. The highest salary package offered in the placement process was INR 10 LPA.

Vishnu Institute for Technology, Bhimavaram was established under the aegis of Sri Vishnu Educational Society in the year 2008. The institute is ranked 149th for B.Tech by IndiaToday 2022 and ranked 106th for B.Tech by The Week 2022. VIT Bhimavaram offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering and many more. Admission is based on marks obtained in the qualifying exam.

PSR Engineering College is a self-financed, private educational institution situated in Sivaski.  The college is affiliated to Anna University and accredited by National Board of Accreditation (NBA). The programs offered by the college has been approved by AICTE, and currently offers undergraduate & postgraduate programs under various specializations. The college is committed to scripting a unique chapter of excellence an education and research, in vital fields like Engineering, IT and Management. The college offers Engineering Education to men and women at UG and PG levels and brings out the total personality, emphasizing ethical values and preparing them to meet the growing challenges of industry and diverse social needs of our nations.

Tula’s Institute was founded in 2006 by Rishabh Educational Trust and is considered to be one of the ‘Top Engineering College in Uttarakhand’ having excellent academic programs ranging from undergraduate to the postgraduate level. The institute believes in providing the best possible facilities for its students. Tula’s endeavor is to create a congenial atmosphere to nurture talent through the support and guidance of experienced faculty with access to state of the art infrastructure.

College Name: Velalar College of Engineering and Technology -[VCET]
Info Data: Velalar College of Engineering and Technology is an autonomous college, affiliated to Anna University, Tamil Nadu and approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). The college has been accredited 'A' Grade by NAAC. It is a private college that provides co-educational services to both the genders. 90% of the students get placements from the on-campus interview held in the college. The top recruiting companies lists include Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and many other IT companies. The only mission of VCET is to expose the students to world-class education and convey a wide range of quality knowledge to them. VCET has Ranked in 140th position for B.Tech, by Indiatoday 2020.

Bhagwant University is a private university located in Ajmer, Rajasthan. It was established in the year 2008 by Govt. of Rajasthan and managed by Bhagwant Group of Institutes which was established in 1999 by the team of professionals and NRIs. The university is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC). It is well set in the lush green area and provides the world-class infrastructure to its students. The university offers the variety of undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral courses in multiple disciplines.

ICFAI University in Jaipur is a part of ICFAI Group imparting knowledge in the fields of Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Engineering, and Law. Graduates from the university are placed in top recruiting companies such as Asian Paints, ITC, BYJU’s, Capital First, OYO Rooms, HDFC AMC, etc. The average salary package offered is INR 4 LPA and the highest salary package offered is INR 17 LPA. Admission at the university is both merit and entrance-based followed by the interview rounds.

United Group of Institutions (UGI) is a well-established private technical and management college located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India. Founded by late Shri Shiv Ram Das Gulati in the year 2005. The institute is known for its quality education and state-of-the-art infrastructure. UGI offering technical education has a total of 9 institutes in Allahabad and Greater Noida. The courses offered by the Institute are NBA accredited. The institutions under UGI are affiliated to UPTU, Lucknow and also approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), Ministry of Human Resources Development, Government of India, New Delhi.

College Name: Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences
Info Data: Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Science, Kadapa, shortly referred to as AITS, was established in 2010 by the Annamacharya Educational Trust. The college offers 5 B.Tech courses and 6 M.Tech courses from among its 6 departments. Admissions to all courses are strictly based on merit received in the entrance examinations. There are only two entrance exams accepted: the AP EAMCET for undergraduate programmes and the AP PGECET for postgraduate programmes. The college has a long list of recruiters as well as an intense organisational structure for placements. The faculty boasts of the many alumni placed abroad, in public sector companies as well as MNCs.

College Name: Babu Banarasi Das Institute of Technology & Management - [BBDITM]
Info Data: Babu Banarasi Das Institute of Technology & Management (BBDITM) was established in the year 1998 in Lucknow. The college is a private institution approved by AICTE and affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU), Lucknow. It is recognized by the NBA. The institute has signed about 10 MoUs with several companies such as Oracle, Amazon, Infosys, and many more.

JB Institute of Technology (JBIT) is a private technical institute established in 2009 at Uttarakhand, Dehradun. It is affiliated to the Uttarakhand Board of Technical Education, Roorkee & Uttarakhand Technical University. The institute has been approved by the Ministry of HRD, New Delhi, and AICTE. It offers courses under the UG, PG domain as well as Diploma courses in the field of engineering, applied sciences, and management. The institute has also maintained a great placement record over the years.

College Name: Malla Reddy Engineering College for Women - [MRECW]
Info Data: Malla Reddy Engineering College for Women (MRECW) Secunderabad, is a private women college, approved by AICTE, affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad, established in the year 2008, located in the district of Medchal at Secunderabad region of Telangana state. The institution is accredited by NBA & NAAC ‘A’ Grade. MRECW provides an unmatched collage for quality teaching with some non-conventional methods having tinged with modern techniques in order to give healthy, working & skilled individuals to the society. offers numerous undergraduate and postgraduate programs in Engineering and Management.

College Name: St. Peter's Institute of Higher Education and Research - [SPIHER]
Info Data: St. Peter’s Institute of Higher Education and Research (SPIHER), Chennai was previously known as St. Peter’s Engineering College. It is one of India's leading institutes, with students from all over the country. SPIHER Chennai offers degree programs in the discipline of Business Economics, Communication, Marketing Management, etc.
